General.Name: Taiwan Fu Hsing Industrial Co Ltd
General.Description: Taiwan Fu Hsing Industrial Co.,Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells door locks and related accessories and furniture in the United States, Asia, Europe, and internationally. It provides residential and commercial door locks, and electronic door controls; and door and patch closers, floor springs, transom closers, and exit devices for fire doors. The company also offers zinc alloy die-castings for hardware products; and mold design and manufacturing, sand blasting, grinding, polishing, buffing, brushing, electroplating, and powder and lacquer coating services. In addition, it provides transom closers; hardware parts; and packing materials and plastic products. The company was incorporated in 1957 and is based in Kaohsiung, Taiwan.
